## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G27420](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G27420)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABCG9</u>
- **Gene Name:** ATP-binding cassette G9
- **Description:**   ABC-2 type transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2124029
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
